night_horizons.raster module¶

Convenient handling of raster data (images, GDAL datasets).

class night_horizons.raster.DatasetWrapper(dataset: str | Dataset, x_bounds: ndarray, y_bounds: ndarray, pixel_width: float, pixel_height: float, n_bands: int = 4, crs: str | CRS = 'EPSG:3857')¶

Bases: object

Somewhat defunct wrapper for GDAL Dataset that better handles working with bounds and pixel resolutions instead of corners, array dimensions, and pixel resolutions. This is useful for mosaics, where the overlap really matters.

property img¶

Image property for quick access. For the base class Image it’s very simple, but will be overwritten by other classes.

property semitransparent_img_int: ndarray[int]¶
show(ax=None, img='img', img_transformer=None, downsample=240.0, *args, **kwargs)¶

NOTE: This will not be consistent with imshow, because with imshow

the y-axis increases downwards, consistent with old image processing schemes. Instead this is consistent with transposing and positively scaling the image to cartesian coordinates.
